main event: An oval-shaped silver object was detected by ground radar in Cleburne, Texas on November 13, 1957.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 10 minutes,The sighting occurred between 1:44 AM to 1:54 AM,The object emitted a sound similar to a distant transport plane,The distance of the object was estimated at 3 miles,The object was traveling in the opposite direction of the Dallas-Fort Worth Airport.
witness description: The report mentions the observer's sincerity and truthfulness.
